1:
Blessed are those whose ways are blameless,\q who walk in the law of Yahweh.
\q
2:
Blessed are they who keep his solemn commands,\q who seek him with all their heart.


\q
3:
They do no wrong;\q they walk in his ways.
\q
4:
You have commanded us to keep your instructions\q so that we should carefully observe them.


\q
5:
Oh, that I would be firmly established\q in the observance of your statutes!
\q
6:
Then I would not be put to shame\q when I think of all your commandments.


\q
7:
I will give thanks to you with an upright heart\q when I learn your righteous decrees.
\q
8:
I will observe your statutes;\q do not leave me alone.


\qa BETH.
\q
9:
How can a young person keep his path pure?\q By obeying your word.
\q
10:
With my whole heart I seek you;\q Do not let me stray from your commandments.


\q
11:
I have stored up your word in my heart\q so that I might not sin against you.
\q
12:
Blessed you are, Yahweh;\q teach me your statutes.


\q
13:
With my mouth I have declared\q all the righteous decrees that you have revealed.
\q
14:
I rejoice in the way of your covenant decrees\q more than in all riches.


\q
15:
I will meditate on your instructions\q and pay attention to your ways.
\q
16:
I delight in your statutes;\q I will not forget your word.


\qa GIMEL.
\q
17:
Be kind to your servant so that I may live\q and keep your word.
\q
18:
Open my eyes so that I may see\q marvelous things in your law.


\q
19:
I am a foreigner in the land;\q do not hide your commandments from me.
\q
20:
My desires are crushed by the longing to know\q your righteous decrees at all times.


\q
21:
You rebuke the proud, who are cursed,\q who wander from your commandments.
\q
22:
Spare me from disgrace and humiliation,\q for I have obeyed your covenant decrees.


\q
23:
Though rulers plot and slander me,\q your servant meditates on your statutes.
\q
24:
Your covenant decrees are my delight,\q and they are my counselors.


\qa DALETH.
\q
25:
My life clings to the dust!\q Give me life by your word.
\q
26:
I told you my ways, and you answered me;\q teach me your statutes.


\q
27:
Make me understand the ways of your instructions,\q so that I can meditate on your wondrous teachings.
\q
28:
I am overwhelmed with grief!\q Strengthen me by your word.


\q
29:
Turn from me the path of deceit;\q graciously teach me your law.
\q
30:
I have chosen the way of faithfulness;\q I have always kept your righteous decrees before me.


\q
31:
I cling to your covenant decrees;\q Yahweh, do not let me be shamed.
\q
32:
I will run in the path of your commandments,\q for you enlarge my heart to do so.


\qa HE.
\q
33:
Teach me, Yahweh, the way of your statutes,\q and I will keep them to the end.
\q
34:
Give me understanding, and I will keep your law;\q I will observe it with all my heart.


\q
35:
Guide me in the path of your commandments,\q for I delight to walk in it.
\q
36:
Direct my heart toward your covenant decrees\q and away from unrighteous gain.


\q
37:
Turn my eyes from looking at worthless things;\q revive me in your ways.
\q
38:
Carry out for your servant your promise\q that you made to those who honor you.


\q
39:
Take away the insults I dread,\q for your righteous judgments are good.
\q
40:
See, I have longed for your instructions;\q revive me in your righteousness.


\qa VAV.
\q
41:
Yahweh, give me your unfailing loveâ€”\q your salvation, according to your promise;
\q
42:
then I will have a reply for the one who mocks me,\q for I trust in your word.


\q
43:
Do not take the word of truth from my mouth,\q for my hope is in your righteous decrees.
\q
44:
I will observe your law continually,\q forever and ever.


\q
45:
I will walk securely,\q for I seek your instructions.
\q
46:
I will speak of your solemn commands before kings\q and will not be ashamed.


\q
47:
I delight in your commandments,\q which I love dearly.
\q
48:
I will lift up my hands to your commandments, which I love;\q I will meditate on your statutes.


\qa ZAYIN.
\q
49:
Call to mind your promise to your servant\q because you have given me hope.
\q
50:
This is my comfort in my affliction:\q that your promise has kept me alive.


\q
51:
The proud have scoffed at me,\q yet I have not turned away from your law.
\q
52:
I have thought about your righteous decrees from ancient times, Yahweh,\q and I comfort myself.


\q
53:
Hot anger has taken hold of me\q because of the wicked who reject your law.
\q
54:
Your statutes have been my songs\q in the house where I temporarily live.


\q
55:
I think about your name during the night, Yahweh,\q and I keep your law.
\q
56:
This has been my practice\q because I have observed your instructions.


\qa HETH.
\q
57:
Yahweh is my portion;\q I have determined to observe your words.
\q
58:
I earnestly request your favor with my whole heart;\q be merciful to me, as your word promised.


\q
59:
I examined my ways\q and turned my feet to your covenant decrees.
\q
60:
I hurry and do not delay\q to keep your commandments.


\q
61:
The cords of the wicked have ensnared me;\q I have not forgotten your law.
\q
62:
At midnight I rise to give thanks to you\q because of your righteous decrees.


\q
63:
I am a companion of all who honor you,\q to all who observe your instructions.
\q
64:
The earth, Yahweh, is full of your covenant faithfulness;\q teach me your statutes.


\qa TETH.
\q
65:
You have done good to your servant,\q Yahweh, by means of your word.
\q
66:
Teach me proper discernment and understanding,\q for I have believed in your commandments.


\q
67:
Before I was afflicted I went astray,\q but now I observe your word.
\q
68:
You are good, and you are one who does good;\q teach me your statutes.


\q
69:
The arrogant have smeared me with lies,\q but I keep your instructions with my whole heart.
\q
70:
Their hearts are hardened,\q but I delight in your law.


\q
71:
It is good for me that I have suffered\q so that I would learn your statutes.
\q
72:
Instruction from your mouth is more precious to me\q than thousands of pieces of gold and silver.


\qa YOD.
\q
73:
Your hands have made and fashioned me;\q give me understanding so that I may learn your commandments.
\q
74:
Those who honor you will be glad when they see me\q because I find hope in your word.


\q
75:
I know, Yahweh, that your decrees are just,\q and that in faithfulness you afflicted me.
\q
76:
Let your covenant faithfulness comfort me,\q as you promised your servant.


\q
77:
Show me compassion so that I may live,\q for your law is my delight.
\q
79:
May those who honor you turn to me,\q those who know your covenant decrees.
\q
80:
May my heart be blameless with respect to your statutes\q so that I may not be put to shame.


\qa KAPH.
\q
81:
I faint with longing that you might rescue me!\q I hope in your word.
\q
82:
My eyes long to see your promise;\q when will you comfort me?


\q
83:
For I have become like a wineskin in the smoke;\q I do not forget your statutes.
\q
84:
How long must your servant endure this;\q when will you judge those who persecute me?


\q
85:
The proud have dug pits for me,\q defying your law.
\q
86:
All your commandments are reliable;\q those people persecute me wrongfully; help me.


\q
87:
They have almost made an end to me on earth,\q but I do not reject your instructions.
\q
88:
By your steadfast love, keep me alive,\q so that I may obey your commands.


\qa LAMEDH.
\q
89:
Yahweh, your word stands forever;\q your word is established firmly in heaven.
\q
90:
Your faithfulness lasts for all generations;\q you have established the earth, and it remains.


\q
91:
All things continue to this day, just as you said in your righteous decrees,\q for all things are your servants.
\q
92:
If your law had not been my delight,\q I would have perished in my affliction.


\q
93:
I will never forget your instructions,\q for through them you have kept me alive.
\q
94:
I am yours; save me,\q for I seek your instructions.


\q
95:
The wicked prepare to destroy me,\q but I will seek to understand your covenant decrees.
\q
96:
I have seen that everything has its limits,\q but your commandments are broad, beyond limits.


\qa MEM.
\q
97:
Oh how I love your law!\q It is my meditation all day long.
\q
98:
Your commandments make me wiser than my enemies,\q for your commandments are always with me.


\q
99:
I have more understanding than all my teachers,\q for I meditate on your covenant decrees.
\q
100:
I understand more than those older than I am;\q this is because I have kept your instructions.


\q
101:
I have kept my feet back from every evil path\q so that I might observe your word.
\q
102:
I have not turned aside from your righteous decrees,\q for you have instructed me.


\q
103:
How sweet are your words to my taste,\q yes, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
\q
104:
Through your instructions I gain discernment;\q therefore I hate every false way.


\qa NUN.
\q
105:
Your word is a lamp to my feet\q and a light for my path.


\q
106:
I have sworn and have confirmed it,\q that I will observe your righteous decrees.


\q
107:
I am very afflicted;\q keep me alive, Yahweh, as you have promised in your word.
\q
108:
Yahweh, please accept the freewill offerings of my mouth,\q and teach me your righteous decrees.


\q
109:
My life is always in my hand,\q yet I do not forget your law.
\q
110:
The wicked have set a snare for me,\q but I have not strayed from your instructions.


\q
111:
I claim your covenant decrees as my heritage forever,\q for they are the joy of my heart.
\q
112:
My heart is set on obeying your statutes\q forever to the very end.


\qa SAMEKH.
\q
113:
I hate those who have a double mind,\q but I love your law.
\q
114:
You are my hiding place and my shield;\q I hope in your word.


\q
115:
Get away from me, you evil doers,\q so that I may observe the commandments of my God.
\q
116:
Sustain me by your word so that I may live\q and not be ashamed of my hope.


\q
117:
Support me, and I will be safe;\q I will always meditate on your statutes.
\q
118:
You reject all those who stray from your statutes,\q for those people are deceptive and unreliable.


\q
119:
You remove all the wicked of the earth like slag;\q therefore I love your solemn commands.
\q
120:
My body trembles in fear of you,\q and I am afraid of your righteous decrees.


\qa AYIN.
\q
121:
I do what is just and right;\q do not abandon me to my oppressors.
\q
122:
Guarantee the welfare of your servant;\q do not let the proud oppress me.


\q
123:
My eyes grow tired as I wait for your salvation\q and for your righteous word.
\q
124:
Show your servant your covenant faithfulness,\q and teach me your statutes.


\q
125:
I am your servant; give me understanding\q so that I may know your covenant decrees.
\q
126:
It is time for Yahweh to act,\q for people have broken your law.


\q
127:
Truly I love your commandments\q more than gold, more than fine gold.
\q
128:
Therefore I carefully follow all your instructions,\q and I hate every path of falsehood.


\qa PE.
\q
129:
Your rules are wonderful,\q that is why I obey them.
\q
130:
The unfolding of your words gives light;\q it gives understanding to the untrained.


\q
131:
I open my mouth and pant,\q for I long for your commandments.
\q
132:
Turn to me and have mercy on me,\q as you always do for those who love your name.


\q
133:
Direct my footsteps by your word;\q do not let any sin rule me.
\q
134:
Redeem me from human oppression\q so that I may observe your instructions.


\q
135:
Let your face shine on your servant,\q and teach me your statutes.
\q
136:
Streams of tears run down from my eyes\q because people do not observe your law.


\qa TSADHE.
\q
137:
You are righteous, Yahweh,\q and your decrees are fair.
\q
138:
You have given your covenant decrees righteously\q and faithfully.


\q
139:
Anger has destroyed me\q because my adversaries forget your words.
\q
140:
Your word has been tested very much,\q and your servant loves it.


\q
141:
I am insignificant and despised,\q yet I do not forget your instructions.
\q
142:
Your justice is forever right,\q and your law is trustworthy.


\q
143:
Though distress and anguish have found me,\q your commandments are still my delight.
\q
144:
Your covenant decrees are righteous forever;\q give me understanding that I may live.


\qa QOPH.
\q
145:
I cried out with my whole heart, "Answer me, Yahweh,\q I will keep your statutes.
\q
146:
I call to you; save me,\q and I will observe your covenant decrees."


\q
147:
I rise before the dawn of the morning and cry for help.\q I hope in your words.
\q
148:
My eyes are open before the night watches change\q so that I might meditate on your word.


\q
149:
Hear my voice in your covenant faithfulness;\q keep me alive, Yahweh, as you have promised in your righteous decrees.
\q
150:
Those who are persecuting me are coming closer to me,\q but they are far from your law.


\q
151:
You are near, Yahweh,\q and all your commandments are trustworthy.
\q
152:
Long ago I learned from your covenant decrees\q that you had set them in place forever.


\qa RESH.
\q
153:
Look on my affliction and help me,\q for I do not forget your law.
\q
154:
Plead my cause and redeem me;\q keep me, as you have promised in your word.


\q
155:
Salvation is far from the wicked,\q for they do not love your statutes.
\q
156:
Great are your merciful actions, Yahweh;\q keep me alive, as you always do.


\q
157:
My persecutors and my foes are many,\q yet I have not turned from your covenant decrees.
\q
158:
I view the treacherous with disgust\q because they do not keep your word.


\q
159:
See how I love your instructions;\q keep me alive, Yahweh, as you have promised by your covenant faithfulness.
\q
160:
The essence of your word is truth;\q every one of your righteous decrees lasts forever.


\qa SHIN.
\q
161:
Princes persecute me without cause,\q but my heart stands in awe of your word.
\q
162:
I rejoice at your word\q like one who finds great plunder.


\q
163:
I hate and despise falsehood,\q but I love your law.
\q
164:
Seven times a day I praise you\q because of your righteous decrees.


\q
165:
Great peace they have, those who love your law;\q nothing makes them stumble.
\q
166:
I hope for your salvation, Yahweh,\q and I obey your commandments.


\q
167:
I observe your solemn commands,\q and I love them greatly.
\q
168:
I keep your instructions and your solemn commands,\q for you are aware of everything I do.


\qa TAV.
\q
169:
Listen to my cry for help, Yahweh;\q give me understanding into your word.
\q
170:
May my plea come before you;\q help me, as you have promised in your word.


\q
171:
May my lips pour out praise,\q for you teach me your statutes.
\q
172:
Let my tongue sing about your word,\q for all your commandments are right.


\q
173:
May your hand help me,\q for I have chosen your instructions.
\q
174:
I long for your rescue, Yahweh,\q and your law is my delight.


\q
175:
May I live and praise you,\q and may your righteous decrees help me.
\q
176:
I have wandered off like a lost sheep;\q seek your servant,
\q for I have not forgotten your commandments.
